flawed_nl_solution:
Kendra has 4 packs x 3 pens/pack =<<4*3=21>>21 pens
Tony has 2 packs x 3 pens/pack = <<2*3=6>>6 pens
In total Kendra and Tony have 21 pens + 6 pens = <<21+6=27>>27 pens
If they each keep 2 pens, they keep 2 x 2 = <<2*2=4>>4 pens
They will be able to give a pen to 27 pens - 4 pens = <<27-4=23>>23 of their friends
#### 23

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
